title: Science Teachers' Teaching Styles and Students' Intrinsic Motivation Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Application of science education models using VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: The 5Es instructional model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate) enhances curiosity and inquiry skills in science classes

Learners replicate 3 designated scientific phenomena (e.g., fluid dynamics, molecular motion) using VR simulation tools, fulfill ≥4 of 5 self-directed learning checklist items during problem-solving, and write experiment reports
Personalized feedback improves intrinsic motivation metrics (interest, persistence, academic self-efficacy) by over 20%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
